about.title: About us
about.content:
Our small and cozy family restaurant is located in beautiful Vaihingen. Our kitchen combines authentic Japanese cuisine and traditional Vietnamese specialties. With more than 15 years of experience we offer you a spectacular experience in a very individual way. 

In addition to traditional dishes, you can expect original new compositions, all prepared with fresh and quality ingredients.

Sounds tempting? Come by and linger a while with one of our homemade drinks or a cold Japanese beer.
